neo:lights:out

This is a simple puzzle game. The aim is to turn off all the lights.

Tap a button. The neighboring buttons will light up too, or turn off – depending on what state they were in before.

This app is a remake of the original Lights Out handheld game that was manufactured by Tiger Electronics. Here's a more detailed description.

If you like this game, please let others know too! Share on Twitter
